Module com.example.pingpong
Package com.example.pingpong.Model

Class Ball

java.lang.Object
com.example.pingpong.Model.Ball
All Implemented Interfaces:
Resizable
public class Ball extends Object implements Resizable
Represents the ball used in the game, including its movement mechanics, collision detection, and resizing capabilities.

      public boolean checkCollisionWithCanvas(double canvasHeight)

      Parameters:

      public void resetPosition(double canvasWidth, double canvasHeight)
      Resets the ball's position to the center of the canvas.
      Parameters:
      canvasWidth - The width of the canvas.
      canvasHeight - The height of the canvas.

    • resetSpeed

      public void resetSpeed()
      Resets the ball's speed to its initial speed.

    • isColliding

      public boolean isColliding(Racket racket)
      Determines if the ball is colliding with the specified racket.
      Parameters:
      racket - The racket to check for collision.
      Returns:
      true if colliding, false otherwise.

    • bounce

      public void bounce(Racket racket)
      Handles the ball's behavior when it collides with a racket, including inverting the direction, increasing the speed, and adjusting the vertical movement based on the impact location.
      Parameters:
      racket - The racket that the ball has collided with.
